body: A lot of Avicus veterans may remember KooDaLord  from Avicus a long time ago. I found him playing badlion arena pvp, and noticed his name was familiar. He was afk at the time, and not responding to my msgs, so I looked him up on Avicus and found him. I was wondering if any of you guys have seen him recently. The YouTuber iDrakePlay may have been on as well :)
body_tagged: A lot of Avicus veterans may remember KooDaLord  from Avicus a long time ago. I found him playing badlion arena pvp, and noticed his name was familiar. He was afk at the time, and not responding to my msgs, so I looked him up on Avicus and found him. I was wondering if any of you guys have seen him recently. The YouTuber iDrakePlay may have been on as well :)
title: KooDaLord
